history.content:
I would say CS161 and CS162 together is a manageable workload, even with recruiting. However, make sure your third class isn't too heavy in workload.

When I took CS161, we could work on projects in groups of 2. I would say the projects aren't too difficult, except for the second project around the middle of the semester, so your workload/stress might spike only at that point, but be fine otherwise. CS162 is also a group project based course. Basically, if you have reliable teammates, you should be able to manage.

Hello everyone, 

Wanted to know if CS161 and CS162 is a manageable workload. For reference, my past workloads were CS170, CS186, Data C100 (in Fall 2018) which I found somewhat stressful with recruiting and ended up P/NPing 170 but did well in other classes and CS 61B and CS 70 (Spring 2018) which was definitely quite manageable.
history.subject: CS161 and CS162 Workload for Next Semester (Fall 2019)
